tb¶

Submodules:

  • tb.check
  • tb.define
  • tb.misc
  • tb.sc

Tight binding package. Define tight binding systems (see submodule tb.define) as instances of the class tb.sc.SuperCell and create the dynamic matrix (tight-binding matrix) using its method tb.sc.SuperCell.tbmat().

Functions¶

tb.intersect(*params)[source]¶

Return intersection of given parameter sets. Expect list of instances of bundle.Bundle. Return instance of bundle.Bundle.

tb.tbmat(scell, format=None)[source]¶

Calculate the tight binding matrix of the given supercell definition scell.
